author: samwilsn
content: Is `pip install 'idna<3'` in the ddht virtualenv going to cause any problems? I had 3.1 installed by default somehow.

author: samwilsn
content: <@!425615769280315392> should probably note the branch in the `launch-trin.sh` script too.

author: jason.carver
content: Did you try it with 3.1? I imagine it was just a "we don't know what will be backwards-incompatible at the next major version" restriction, rather than a "something is definitely wrong at >=3" restriction.

author: samwilsn
content: It just died complaining about the version. Seemed to work fine with 2.10 though.

author: jason.carver
content: `trin` works on master for me, does it not for you?

author: samwilsn
content: Wasn't anywhere to apply the bootnode patch
